title: JEE Main cutoff for CS
content: I can't seem to find any information about the JEE Main cutoff rank. I've gotten 99.008 percentile in session 1 of JEE Main. Will it be enough to get a CS seat in Ring Road campus? I likely won't get CS in any of the good NITs so wanted to know whether it'll be enough to keep PES as a backup.

comments.body: You sure PES is your best option at 99 percentile ðŸ˜‚?
I know it's not but I just want to keep my options open in case I don't get CS in any of the good NITs or IIITs
Why not iiit gwalior.. It's the 5th best iiit after hyd, blr, allahabad, lucknow..
I really don't think I can get that with my current percentile, it's cutoff rank last year was 7000.
Check csab round 2 cutoffs dude.. You'll be getting mnc or IT at 14k there
Oh alright I'll have a look. Thanks a ton
hey, I got 98.86 in Jan and PES is my backup too, can I dm
OP, even I can't find legitimate information or anything listed on the website, please share anything that you find out

last year when my friend went to campus and asked it was 98.7%ile or something, and fees is same as pessat (about 5L per year)

rather join some other college because you'll be paying as much as a pessat kid who gets in with 1/4th of the effort (i had mid 90s in mains and rank 6xx in pessat which gets you CSE in RR campus lmao)

are you sure you want to be a part of the same crowd while being of a higher caliber ?
Bruh, lost potential going to PES fr
